subject: Football
Community Colleges
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Ray Perkins’s résumé includes head coaching stints with the Giants, the Buccaneers and Alabama. Now he has added Jones County Junior College in Mississippi at age 70.
snippet: Ray Perkins’s résumé includes head coaching stints with the Giants, the Buccaneers and Alabama. Now he has added Jones County Junior College in Mississippi at age 70.
